welcome.other:
👋 Hello! I'm your AI assistant.

I can answer questions, provide help, and have conversations.

Click the buttons below to get started!

help.other:
📚 **Help**

**Available Commands:**
• /start - Start using the bot
• /help - Show help
• /models - Select AI model
• /settings - Configure language
• /clear - Clear conversation history
• /stats - View statistics

**How to Use:**
• Send messages directly to chat
• @mention me or reply to my messages in groups
• Use the button menu for quick actions

unknown_command.other: ❓ Unknown command. Use /help to see available commands.

rate_limit_exceeded.other: ⚠️ You're sending too many requests. Please try again later.

error.other: ❌ An error occurred. Please try again later.
